Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Reroute at Jackson/Campbell
ShortDescription: 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, California, Madison, Western, & Jackson, due to street blockage near Jackson/Campbell.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Jackson, California, Madison, Western, & Jackson, due to street blockage near Jackson/Campbell.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #97 Skokie Temporary Reroute near Howard/Hoyne
ShortDescription: 97 Skokie buses temp. rerouted WB: Howard, Clark, Rogers, Ridge, Howard; EB: Howard, Ridge, Rogers, into the terminal, due to street blockage near Howard/Hoyne.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Revised: #97 Skokie buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Howard/Hoyne, due to street blockage.

Westbound buses will operate via Howard, Clark, Rogers, Ridge, & Howard.

Eastbound buses will operate via Howard, Ridge, Rogers, & into the terminal.

Allow extra travel time.
